name: create_event
description: Creates an event on the user's Google Calendar, can also create recurring events.

parameters.description: The event's body formatted to Google's Event Resource schema, when inputting time use ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSÂ±HH:MM)

recurrence.description: RFC 5545 recurrence rules (e.g., 'RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;COUNT=10'). Omit for one-time events.

items.description: Single recurrence rule line, e.g., 'RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;COUNT=5' or 'EXDATE;TZID=Asia/Bangkok:20251225T090000'.

name: list_events
description: Lists the next 'max_amount' of events on user's calendar. Returns the events IDs, summary, and other useful tags.

start_date.description: The lower bound or starting date from which events are going to be listed (already set to current date by default).

end_date.description: The upper bound or ending date to which events are going to be listed (already set to None by default).

max_amount.description: Integer value representing the amount of events to be listed (already set to 20 by default).

name: delete_event
description: Deletes an event or recurring event on the user's calendar (requires eventId, use 'list_events' to get it)
